name: Deitox
description:
Deitox is a GB-Studio game about a god who's tired of all the work. They descend to find people still asking for things, and decide it might be best to let them handle their own problems by giving them their powers, and eventually get the Deity Detox they're looking for.

Controls:

  • Platformer:  WASD / Arrow Keys Movement, Z / J Jump & Interact, X / K Shoot
  • Top-Down: WASD / Arrow Keys Movement, Z / J Jump & Interact

Game made over the period of ~2 weeks for the Back To The Beginnings Jam, we got plenty of work done but had to cut it short to only 1 area for the sake of time. Had a fun time learning and working together!

Game by Bicho-Bijou (HydraVT, MurphyisCreature, MarshieLee, MonsterFangss, & Mamooranth)

Additional Credits:

  • Music - TipTopTomCat
  • Fonts - Joel J Games
  • GB-Studio -Chris Maltby
